title: Build CineVerse movie streaming app with cinematic UI

requirements.text: Create a splash screen that displays on app launch with the CineVerse branding
acceptanceCriteria: Splash screen displays CineVerse branding
Screen transitions to home after brief delay
Uses dark cinematic theme

requirements.text: Build a home screen with a trending movies carousel banner at the top that auto-rotates through featured movies

quotes: Home screen with trending movie banners

acceptanceCriteria: Carousel displays trending movie banners
Auto-rotation with smooth transitions
Users can manually swipe between banners
Each banner shows movie poster and title

requirements.text: Display movie category sections on the home screen for Action, Comedy, Kids, Bollywood, and Hollywood with horizontal scrollable movie cards
acceptanceCriteria: Five category sections displayed on home screen
Each section has a category title
Horizontal scrollable list of movie cards per category
Movie cards show poster thumbnail and title

requirements.text: Create an AI recommendation section on the home screen that suggests movies based on user interests

quotes: AI recommendation section based on user interests

acceptanceCriteria: Recommendation section appears on home screen
Section labeled as personalized or AI-powered recommendations
Displays recommended movie cards horizontally
Recommendations update based on user watch history or preferences

requirements.text: Build a movie detail page that displays movie poster, trailer preview player, rating, cast list, description, and a watch button

quotes: Movie detail page with poster, trailer preview, rating, cast, and watch button

acceptanceCriteria: Detail page shows large movie poster
Trailer preview embedded with play controls
Rating displayed prominently
Cast members listed with names and roles
Movie description text shown
Watch button navigates to playback or adds to continue watching

requirements.text: Implement a search bar with smart suggestions that appears when users start typing movie titles or keywords
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar accessible from navigation
Real-time suggestions appear as user types
Suggestions include movie titles and relevant matches
Clicking a suggestion navigates to movie detail page

requirements.text: Create a watchlist feature where users can add and remove movies to watch later
acceptanceCriteria: Add to watchlist button on movie detail page
Watchlist accessible from profile or navigation
Displays all saved movies with posters
Users can remove movies from watchlist

requirements.text: Build a Continue Watching section that tracks partially watched movies and displays them for easy resume
acceptanceCriteria: Continue Watching section appears on home screen
Shows movies user has started but not finished
Each card displays progress indicator
Clicking resumes playback from last position

requirements.text: Create a Kids Mode with a colorful, safe interface that filters content appropriate for children

quotes: Kids Mode with colorful safe interface

acceptanceCriteria: Kids Mode toggle accessible from profile or settings
Interface uses bright, playful colors when active
Only displays age-appropriate content
Visual indicator shows Kids Mode is active

requirements.text: Build user login and signup flows with authentication and profile creation
acceptanceCriteria: Signup form collects necessary user information
Login form authenticates existing users
Session persists after successful login
Error messages display for invalid credentials

requirements.text: Create a profile page that displays user information, preferences, and settings options
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page shows user name and avatar
Settings options accessible
Kids Mode toggle available
Logout option present

requirements.text: Create a categories page that allows users to browse all available movie categories
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated categories page accessible from navigation
All movie categories displayed with visual cards or tiles
Clicking a category shows movies in that category

requirements.text: Populate the app with sample movie data including titles, posters, ratings, cast, descriptions, trailers, and category classifications
acceptanceCriteria: At least 20 sample movies with complete metadata
Movies distributed across all categories
Each movie has poster image, rating, cast, and description
Sample data includes movies suitable for Kids Mode

requirements.text: Implement navigation flow that allows users to move between Splash Screen, Home, Categories, Movie Details, Search, and Profile pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu or bottom bar accessible from main screens
Users can navigate to all major sections
Back navigation works consistently
Smooth transitions between pages

requirements.text: Apply a dark cinematic UI theme with minimal premium OTT styling, smooth animations, rounded cards, modern fonts, and mobile-first layout optimized for Android devices

quotes: Minimal, premium OTT style like Netflix, smooth animations, rounded cards, modern fonts, mobile-first layout

acceptanceCriteria: Dark color scheme with cinematic blacks and deep grays
Rounded corners on all cards and containers
Smooth transitions and micro-animations
Modern, readable typography throughout
Layout optimized for mobile portrait orientation
Touch targets sized appropriately for mobile
Fast loading with optimized images

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication instead of custom login system
Frontend must use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Backend must use Motoko with single-actor architecture
No external database or third-party video streaming APIs
No real-time WebSocket features for live updates
nonGoals: Actual video streaming or playback functionality
Integration with real movie databases or APIs
Social features like comments or ratings from other users
